item.title: x86 Part. 1 — CPU
item.description: This series of articles covers basic low-level concepts in computers, with a specific focus on exploring binaries and reverse engineering. Some points may seem confusing at first, but remember: everything follows a definition. Don’t get stuck in an endless loop of “why!?!” — just understand each concept and its purpose. You will use these concepts in reverse engineering, binary exploitation, and even malware development in the future. What is a CPU?
